name: electron-typescript-definitions
description: Automatically generated TypeScript definitions files for the Electron API

scripts.prepublish: npm run demo && npm run test-output
scripts.test: mocha && standard && npm run test-output && npm run lint-output
scripts.pretest-output: npm run build -- -o=test-smoke/electron/index.d.ts && cd test-smoke/electron/test && rm -f *.js
scripts.test-output: tslint electron.d.ts --format stylish && cd test-smoke/electron && tsc --project tsconfig.json
